snippet: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said the coup plotters would “pay a heavy price.” The prime minister said 265 people had been killed and more than 2,800 military personnel had been detained....
lead_paragraph: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said the coup plotters would “pay a heavy price.” The prime minister said 265 people had been killed and more than 2,800 military personnel had been detained.

headline.main: Tumult in Turkey: What We Know and Don’t Know

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
